title: Define project scope and goals
description: Identify the specific industries and languages that TranslateTechIa will support, as well as the quality standards it aims to meet.

title: Research and evaluate AI and machine learning technologies
description: Identify the most suitable AI and machine learning technologies for TranslateTechIa's purpose, considering factors such as accuracy, efficiency, scalability, and cost.

title: Design the core architecture of TranslateTechIa
description: Create a high-level design for the system's architecture, including the components and interactions between them.
dependencies: Research and evaluate AI and machine learning technologies

title: Develop the frontend interface for TranslateTechIa
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface that allows users to easily input text, select languages, and view translations.
dependencies: Design the core architecture of TranslateTechIa

title: Implement the backend services for TranslateTechIa
description: Develop the server-side logic that handles text input, AI and machine learning model integration, and translation output.
dependencies: Design the core architecture of TranslateTechIa

title: Set up the database structure for TranslateTechIa
description: Design and implement a scalable and efficient database to store user data, translation requests, and AI model training data.
dependencies: Design the core architecture of TranslateTechIa

title: Perform security audits on the system
description: Identify and address potential security vulnerabilities in the TranslateTechIa system, ensuring user data privacy and secure communication between components.
dependencies: Design the core architecture of TranslateTechIa

title: Perform functional testing on TranslateTechIa
description: Test the functionality, usability, and performance of the TranslateTechIa system to ensure it meets the project's goals.
dependencies: Develop the frontend interface for TranslateTechIa
Implement the backend services for TranslateTechIa

title: Review and refine project requirements and specifications
description: Review and refine the project's requirements, specifications, and goals based on feedback from functional testing.
